description: Transportation, travel, vehicles, and getting around

sentences.english: I take the bus to work every day.
sentences.explanation: 'Prendre le bus' = to take the bus. 'Pour aller au travail' = to go to work.

sentences.english: The train arrives at 3 PM.
sentences.explanation: 'Arriver à' = to arrive at. 24-hour time: 15 heures = 3 PM.

sentences.english: She drives her car to the mall.
sentences.explanation: 'Conduire' = to drive (irregular). 'Au centre commercial' = to the mall.

sentences.english: We need to buy metro tickets.
sentences.explanation: 'Devoir acheter' = need to buy. 'Des tickets de métro' = metro tickets.

sentences.english: The airplane took off on time.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: a décollé. 'Décoller' = to take off. 'À l'heure' = on time.

sentences.english: I'm waiting for the taxi.
sentences.explanation: 'Attendre' = to wait for (no preposition needed). Present continuous context.

sentences.english: The bicycle has a flat tire.
sentences.explanation: 'Le vélo' = bicycle. 'Un pneu crevé' = a flat tire. Vehicle problems.

sentences.english: He rides his motorcycle to school.
sentences.explanation: 'Aller en moto' = to go by motorcycle. Transportation prepositions.

sentences.english: The subway is crowded during rush hour.
sentences.explanation: 'Bondé' = crowded. 'Aux heures de pointe' = during rush hour.

sentences.english: We walk to the nearby station.
sentences.explanation: 'Marcher jusqu'à' = to walk to. 'La gare proche' = the nearby station.

sentences.english: The ship sails across the ocean.
sentences.explanation: 'Naviguer' = to sail. 'À travers l'océan' = across the ocean.

sentences.english: I forgot my bus pass at home.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: j'ai oublié. 'Ma carte de bus' = my bus pass. 'À la maison' = at home.

sentences.english: The car needs gasoline.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir besoin de' = to need. 'L'essence' = gasoline. Vehicle maintenance.

sentences.english: She missed the last train.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: a raté. 'Rater' = to miss (transportation). 'Le dernier train' = last train.

sentences.english: Traffic is heavy this morning.
sentences.explanation: 'La circulation' = traffic. 'Dense' = heavy (traffic). 'Ce matin' = this morning.

sentences.english: I prefer traveling by train.
sentences.explanation: 'Préférer' = to prefer. 'Voyager en train' = to travel by train.

sentences.english: The driver honks the horn.
sentences.explanation: 'Le conducteur' = driver. 'Klaxonner' = to honk. Driving behaviors.

sentences.english: We parked in the underground garage.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: avons garé. 'Le parking souterrain' = underground parking.

sentences.english: The boat docks at the harbor.
sentences.explanation: 'Accoster' = to dock. 'Au port' = at the harbor. Maritime vocabulary.

sentences.english: I need directions to the airport.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir besoin d'indications' = to need directions. 'Pour l'aéroport' = to the airport.

sentences.english: The motorcycle is faster than the bicycle.
sentences.explanation: 'Plus rapide que' = faster than. Comparative structure in transportation.

sentences.english: We missed our connection flight.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: avons raté. 'Vol de correspondance' = connection flight.

sentences.english: The driver pays the toll at the highway.
sentences.explanation: 'Payer le péage' = to pay the toll. 'Sur l'autoroute' = on the highway.

sentences.english: I prefer traveling during off-peak hours.
sentences.explanation: 'Les heures creuses' = off-peak hours. Travel timing preferences.

sentences.english: The cruise ship docks at the port tomorrow.
sentences.explanation: 'Le bateau de croisière' = cruise ship. Future scheduling vocabulary.

sentences.english: She books tickets online in advance.
sentences.explanation: 'Réserver en ligne' = to book online. 'À l'avance' = in advance.

sentences.english: The tram runs every ten minutes.
sentences.explanation: 'Le tramway passe' = the tram runs. 'Toutes les dix minutes' = every ten minutes.

sentences.english: I need to refuel my car.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire le plein' = to refuel. 'Devoir' + infinitive = need to.

sentences.english: The ferry connects the two islands.
sentences.explanation: 'Le ferry relie' = the ferry connects. Island transportation vocabulary.

sentences.english: We carpool to save money.
sentences.explanation: 'Faire du covoiturage' = to carpool. 'Pour économiser' = to save money.

sentences.english: The speed limit is 130 km/h.
sentences.explanation: 'La limitation de vitesse' = speed limit. Road regulations vocabulary.

sentences.english: I lost my parking ticket.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: j'ai perdu. 'Ticket de parking' = parking ticket.

sentences.english: The helicopter flies over the city.
sentences.explanation: 'Voler au-dessus de' = to fly over. Aerial transportation vocabulary.

sentences.english: She checks in at the airport counter.
sentences.explanation: 'S'enregistrer' = to check in. Airport procedures vocabulary.

sentences.english: The van can carry eight passengers.
sentences.explanation: 'Transporter des passagers' = to carry passengers. Vehicle capacity vocabulary.

sentences.english: I called a ride-sharing service.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: j'ai appelé. Modern transportation services vocabulary.

sentences.english: The cable car goes up the mountain.
sentences.explanation: 'Le téléphérique' = cable car. Mountain transportation vocabulary.

sentences.english: We wait at the bus shelter.
sentences.explanation: 'L'abribus' = bus shelter. Public transport infrastructure vocabulary.

sentences.english: The truck delivers goods to stores.
sentences.explanation: 'Livrer des marchandises' = to deliver goods. Commercial transport vocabulary.

sentences.english: I'm learning to drive a manual car.
sentences.explanation: 'Apprendre à conduire' = to learn to drive. Manual vs automatic transmission.

sentences.english: The train whistle announces departure.
sentences.explanation: 'Le sifflet du train' = train whistle. Railway signals vocabulary.

sentences.english: She prefers aisle seats on airplanes.
sentences.explanation: 'Sièges côté couloir' = aisle seats. Airplane seating preferences.

sentences.english: The taxi meter shows the fare.
sentences.explanation: 'Le compteur du taxi' = taxi meter. 'Afficher le prix' = to show the fare.

sentences.english: We crossed the bridge by foot.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: avons traversé. 'À pied' = by foot/on foot.

sentences.english: The scooter is parked illegally.
sentences.explanation: 'Garé illégalement' = parked illegally. Parking violations vocabulary.

sentences.english: I bought a monthly travel pass.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: j'ai acheté. 'Abonnement mensuel' = monthly pass.

sentences.english: The road is closed for construction.
sentences.explanation: 'Fermée pour travaux' = closed for construction. Road conditions vocabulary.

sentences.english: She signals before changing lanes.
sentences.explanation: 'Signaler avant de changer de voie' = to signal before changing lanes.

sentences.english: The luggage weighs too much.
sentences.explanation: 'Peser trop lourd' = to weigh too much. Travel luggage vocabulary.

sentences.english: I rent a car for the weekend.
sentences.explanation: 'Louer une voiture' = to rent a car. Car rental vocabulary.

sentences.english: The escalator is out of order.
sentences.explanation: 'En panne' = out of order. Public facility problems vocabulary.

sentences.english: We board the plane at gate 15.
sentences.explanation: 'Embarquer dans l'avion' = to board the plane. Airport boarding vocabulary.

sentences.english: The motorcycle helmet is mandatory.
sentences.explanation: 'Le casque est obligatoire' = the helmet is mandatory. Safety regulations.

sentences.english: I parallel park between two cars.
sentences.explanation: 'Se garer en créneau' = to parallel park. Parking techniques vocabulary.

sentences.english: The ticket inspector checks our passes.
sentences.explanation: 'Le contrôleur vérifie' = the inspector checks. Public transport control.

sentences.english: She fastens her seatbelt before driving.
sentences.explanation: 'Attacher sa ceinture' = to fasten seatbelt. Driving safety vocabulary.

sentences.english: The GPS gives turn-by-turn directions.
sentences.explanation: 'Étape par étape' = step by step/turn by turn. Navigation vocabulary.

sentences.english: We took a detour to avoid traffic.
sentences.explanation: Passé composé: avons pris. 'Prendre un détour' = to take a detour.

sentences.english: The hybrid car uses less fuel.
sentences.explanation: 'Consommer moins d'essence' = to use less fuel. Eco-friendly vehicles.

sentences.english: I validate my ticket before entering.
sentences.explanation: 'Valider son billet' = to validate ticket. Public transport procedures.

sentences.english: The roundabout regulates traffic flow.
sentences.explanation: 'Le rond-point régule' = the roundabout regulates. Traffic management.

sentences.english: She adjusts the mirrors before driving.
sentences.explanation: 'Régler les rétroviseurs' = to adjust mirrors. Pre-driving preparation.

sentences.english: The electric scooter needs charging.
sentences.explanation: 'Avoir besoin de recharge' = to need charging. Electric transport vocabulary.

sentences.english: We transfer at the next station.
sentences.explanation: 'Changer à la station' = to transfer at the station. Public transport connections.

sentences.english: The cargo ship carries containers.
sentences.explanation: 'Le cargo transporte' = the cargo ship carries. Maritime freight vocabulary.

sentences.english: I pump air into the bicycle tires.
sentences.explanation: 'Gonfler les pneus' = to pump/inflate tires. Bicycle maintenance vocabulary.

sentences.english: The flight is delayed due to weather.
sentences.explanation: 'À cause du temps' = due to weather. Flight delay vocabulary.

sentences.english: She calls a tow truck for help.
sentences.explanation: 'Appeler une dépanneuse' = to call a tow truck. Vehicle breakdown vocabulary.

sentences.english: The commuter train connects suburbs.
sentences.explanation: 'Le train de banlieue' = commuter train. Suburban transport vocabulary.

sentences.english: I wear protective gear when cycling.
sentences.explanation: 'Porter des équipements de protection' = to wear protective gear.

sentences.english: The bus stop has a digital display.
sentences.explanation: 'Un affichage numérique' = a digital display. Modern transport infrastructure.

sentences.english: We respect traffic signals.
sentences.explanation: 'Respecter les feux' = to respect traffic lights. Traffic safety vocabulary.

sentences.english: The delivery truck blocks the street.
sentences.explanation: 'Le camion de livraison' = delivery truck. Urban traffic vocabulary.

sentences.english: I reserve a seat by the window.
sentences.explanation: 'Une place côté fenêtre' = a window seat. Seat reservation vocabulary.

sentences.english: The mechanic repairs the engine.
sentences.explanation: 'Réparer le moteur' = to repair the engine. Vehicle repair vocabulary.

sentences.english: We use public transport to reduce pollution.
sentences.explanation: 'Pour réduire la pollution' = to reduce pollution. Environmental awareness.

sentences.english: The highway has three lanes each direction.
sentences.explanation: 'Trois voies dans chaque sens' = three lanes each direction. Highway vocabulary.

sentences.english: I follow the route on my smartphone.
sentences.explanation: 'Suivre l'itinéraire' = to follow the route. Modern navigation vocabulary.

sentences.english: The pedestrian crosses at the crosswalk.
sentences.explanation: 'Traverser au passage protégé' = to cross at the crosswalk. Pedestrian safety.

sentences.english: She reports the accident to insurance.
sentences.explanation: 'Déclarer l'accident' = to report the accident. Insurance procedures.

sentences.english: The tunnel goes under the river.
sentences.explanation: 'Passer sous' = to go under. Underground infrastructure vocabulary.

sentences.english: I check tire pressure regularly.
sentences.explanation: 'Vérifier la pression' = to check pressure. Vehicle maintenance vocabulary.

sentences.english: The airport shuttle runs every 20 minutes.
sentences.explanation: 'La navette d'aéroport' = airport shuttle. Airport transport vocabulary.

sentences.english: We share the cost of gasoline.
sentences.explanation: 'Partager le coût' = to share the cost. Cost-sharing vocabulary.

sentences.english: The first-class compartment is more comfortable.
sentences.explanation: 'Plus confortable' = more comfortable. Travel class comparisons.

sentences.english: I show my driver's license to police.
sentences.explanation: 'Montrer son permis' = to show license. Police control vocabulary.

sentences.english: The bike lane is separated from traffic.
sentences.explanation: 'La piste cyclable' = bike lane. Cycling infrastructure vocabulary.

sentences.english: We arrive at our destination safely.
sentences.explanation: 'Arriver en sécurité' = to arrive safely. Safe arrival vocabulary.

sentences.english: The express train skips several stations.
sentences.explanation: 'Sauter des gares' = to skip stations. Express service vocabulary.

sentences.english: I maintain a safe following distance.
sentences.explanation: 'Garder une distance de sécurité' = to maintain safe distance. Driving safety.

sentences.english: The traffic circle improves flow.
sentences.explanation: 'Améliorer la fluidité' = to improve flow. Traffic engineering vocabulary.

sentences.english: She uses public charging stations.
sentences.explanation: 'Les bornes de recharge' = charging stations. Electric vehicle infrastructure.

sentences.english: The boat captain navigates by GPS.
sentences.explanation: 'Naviguer au GPS' = to navigate by GPS. Maritime navigation vocabulary.

sentences.english: I return the rental car on time.
sentences.explanation: 'Rendre à l'heure' = to return on time. Car rental procedures.

sentences.english: The pedestrian bridge connects both sides.
sentences.explanation: 'La passerelle piétonne' = pedestrian bridge. Urban infrastructure vocabulary.

sentences.english: We board the last train home.
sentences.explanation: 'Le dernier train pour rentrer' = the last train home. Late travel vocabulary.

sentences.english: The intersection has traffic cameras.
sentences.explanation: 'Des caméras de circulation' = traffic cameras. Traffic monitoring vocabulary.

sentences.english: I avoid rush hour whenever possible.
sentences.explanation: 'Éviter les heures de pointe' = to avoid rush hour. Traffic timing vocabulary.

sentences.english: The automatic doors open at stations.
sentences.explanation: 'Les portes automatiques s'ouvrent' = automatic doors open. Transport technology.

sentences.english: We plan our journey using transport apps.
sentences.explanation: 'Planifier avec des applis' = to plan using apps. Modern travel planning.
